item.description:
**** Email Confirmation Required ****

If you've RSVPd YES, you must confirm with Tonya via email before 11am on Saturday, August 25th that you will join us.

** If you don't email, It is assumed you're not able to attend and your RSVP will be changed to NO. **

If it is less than twenty-fours from the event and you are not able to attend or are running late, you must text or call Tonya at (617) 445-7549.


Thanks to Shirley, the newest organizer, we will be enjoying brunch at East Coast Grill which the Phantom Gourmet describes as:

"Claiming the world's largest Bloody Mary bar, East Coast Grill & Raw Bar is a famously fun restaurant with a wacky Sunday brunch. Their specialty barbequed seafood is in full effect, but the Latin flavored eggs are just as good."

Join fellow brunch buddies for a fun time on a spicy culinary adventure.

East Coast Brunch Menu

You may call East Coast for parking details at (617) 491-6568
Check mbta.com for train and bus directions.


The following MEMBER GUIDELINES were developed so our events run smoothly.


Our focus is on friendly and respectful gatherings while sharing a delicious meal.

Please be considerate of your fellow diners time by arriving promptly for events.

Please bring enough cash to pay for your meal, drinks, tip, and tax.

Please RSVP YES only if you are certain you will attend an event.

If your name appears on the event page as a YES after the event and you have not attended the event, it is counted as a NO-SHOW.

If you change your RSVP from a YES to a NO after 11am Saturday August 25th, it is counted as a NO-SHOW.

If any guests you've RSVPd for NO-SHOW it will count as if you've NO-SHOWED.

If you are a NO-SHOW for three events you are removed from the group.

NO-SHOWS impact everyone; from you, who could or has been on the wait list to the organizer as well as the restaurant's who staff based on our reservation.

If it is less than twenty-fours from the event and you are not able to attend or are running late, you must text or call Tonya at (617) 445-7549.

An email from you explaining your absence is an expected courtesy.

Your feedback is appreciated, so please rate the event and venue by completing the surveys after the events.

group.name: Breakfast, Brunch, Lunch, & Dinner Meetup Group

item.name: East Coast Brunch With Punch
